messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, not more than 15 [REDACTED] have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Massive $*e#pace anomaly detected on all frequencies. All crew are directed to @!$, CH-ETR NYY HAGEHGUF <&. the anomalies and destroy their source to prevent further damage to corporate property. This is not a drill. Estimated time of appearance: 300 seconds. Use this time to prepare for an attack on Space Station 13.
